output.sentences: It feels like all plants and flowers are at their most beautiful in the spring.
In this time of year the trees are firm and crisp.
It makes me want to set to work the hard ground like the best gardener around.
If I were a gardener, I would make sure all my seeds were perfectly aligned.
I'd do a tremendous amount of work until it grew into the most luscious garden.
